overview:
Jobatics is a powerful new recruitment service in the Middle East that helps you find and recruit the right staff, in the right time with the right budget. We love the social media and the powerful of web and that’s what makes Jobatics different. We are dynamic, updated and we use the new media in the recruitment process. Because the recruitment business is about people and only people, we came to give the online recruitment the human touch and give back to humanity.

Mission To provide people and companies with a harmonious relationship in a loving workplace !

Why people will love Jobatics?

  1. We are here to give

Jobatics is a social enterprise by our business model. Giving back to the community is in our core values. Because our business is about people and only people. We will donate a percentage of our revenues to fund educational projects

  1. 1-Click Social Recruiting

Spreading your jobs on the social networks in one click using our integrated social networks distribution feature. Using social networks such as LinkedIn, Facebook, Twitter & Youtube as part of the recruitment process.

  1. Social Profiles

The social networks are integrated with the applicants profiles and resumes, because you hire the mind, you can easily check the applicant social history. Also users can login using their Facebook & LinkedIn profiles, import their data into the resumes with a few clicks. This saves the user time and makes registration easier.

  1. Mobile Interface

Everyone has a smart phone and many job seekers are using their phones to find jobs. With our mobile interface, whenever a user visits the site on their phone a mobile-friendly interface will appear, making it quick and easy for the user to navigate the site.

Explore our website to find out how great our features is and why you love Jobatics!
